Nintendo's Draconian Stance against System Modification

Nintendo is one of the most creative and innovative video game companies in the world, but their stance against modifications of their products is nothing short of Draconian. In short, Nintendo Wii consoles says there is no legitimate purpose for game copying devices, emulators, and modification (mod) chips or other devices that enable homebrew applications. Sony and Microsoft have similar stances, but are a little more discreet in expressing their disdain for such devices, though no less aggressive in filing lawsuits against large-scale distributors of such devices.

Nintendo own legal information FAQ states, "mod chips integrated security system in Nintendo DS R4 Card products. To install the mod chip into a Nintendo hardware system, it is necessary to dismantle the product and, in some instances, remove components. " Nintendo automatically equate using mod chips to circumvent the security of Nintendo products. This is an interesting view, considering most of us believe that once we buy a product now is a product of our own and not the manufacturer. Can you imagine a car manufacturer claims are similar? Ford could claim to change a computer chip in the car safety prevents Ford products. However, most of us believe that once you pay for a vehicle that is yours to alter most any way you choose. Nintendo says exceptions for video game consoles that few companies would dare claim. Nintendo says that even though you bought the product, which still belongs to Nintendo and the alteration, regardless of the reason, somehow Nintendo damage. They want the act of altering the device is illegal, even without proof of criminal use of the modified product.

Just generally because a online game method modification allows illegal activity does not suggest it could be employed for the purpose. utilizing the car metaphor from earlier, just generally because I could modify my Ford car to significantly exceed the demand restrict does not suggest I will blow by method of a college zone accomplishing 88 mph. Just generally because I modify my Nintendo online game method does not suggest I will use it to illegally duplicate and/or distribute games .

In practically any place outside using the film video games industry, producing a modification for the residence would not be illegal, even if that modification could allow the all round performance of an illegal act. Nintendo acknowledges only just one use for these devices, and that could be the illegal copying and distribution of film games. This look at discounts the many legitimate utilizes for modification devices. For instance, instead many grownup males and ladies use their Nintendo handhelds to review traditional literature. This calls for using products Nintendo promises are only utilized for piracy.

Making it illegal to modify a product you compensated for is absurd. Unfortunately, if Nintendo gaming flash card has its way, you will spend for just about any product and never legally be permitted to take advantage of it for something for which Nintendo does not approve.
